attributes.action: Refund car insurance money at the end of the of policy If there was no faults
attributes.additional_details: It is quiet unfair that the money disappears as soon as the insurance period is over and no claim has been made.
attributes.background: Car insurance is fairly high. Although cars are more frequently used in the environment, there may be more road collisions. But, in cases where a driver has been careful after paying a large amount for insurance, it is fair for this amount to be refunded back to the policy holder if no claims made.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for individual insurance companies.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
